title: [SUMMER SALE'24] 2200AC Exchange Ticket
description:
An exchange ticket for 2,200 ARKS Cash (AC).

- Purchasable 1 time only.

- The discount may not be exactly 55%, depending on your country's currency.

- After purchasing this ticket, collect your 2,200 AC in-game currency by logging in to the game.
longDescription:
A one-time only exchange ticket for 2,200 ARKS Cash (AC), an in-game currency for Phantasy Star Online 2 New Genesis, at a special price.

- Purchasable 1 time only.

- The discount may not be exactly 55%, depending on your country's currency.

- After purchasing this ticket, collect your 2,200 AC in-game currency by logging in to the game. This is not an in-game item. The AC will be credited to your account after logging in. Please check the Log Window.

- AC can be used in-game to purchase AC Shop items, as well as AC Scratch Tickets.

- AC is an in-game currency for Phantasy Star Online 2 New Genesis.
It cannot be used for other services or services within Japan.

- This content requires Phantasy Star Online 2 New Genesis.
Please update to the latest patch if necessary.

- If this is your first purchase, it may take up to 24 hours for it to be reflected within the game.
If more than 48 hours have passed and the purchase still has not been reflected, please contact us through the Phantasy Star Online 2 New Genesis Official Website.

- Please note that AC redeemed with this ticket cannot be used for the PS4 version.
